website_summaries.verdict: A great pack of affordable off road lights you can place in various positions around the vehicle.
pros: Pack comes with 4 circular flood lights that can be mounted on the bumpers or roof of a vehicle
Weatherproof and water-resistant enough to be used on marine craft such as boats
cons: Some lights in the pack may fail to work right out of the box
Fasteners can spin around if not secured properly

customer_reviews.title: Very Bright For Their Size!
customer_reviews.text: I attached these to my go kart dune buggy. Very bright! They work fantastic and exactly what I needed. They come with proper wires to attach. However you will need the wire set to go all the way to the battery.
customer_reviews.author: MBx_ProReviewerTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: I needed more work light for the tractor
customer_reviews.text: Tapped into existing wiring to add work lights for rear and both sides of tractor. Mounts are same as came with tractor. Tip: when you need light, you never have enough.
customer_reviews.author: nhoj odarroc

customer_reviews.title: Great lights for the price
customer_reviews.text: These lights or worth the money so much brighter then the old lights & way much cheaper then some lights I looked at will be buying more to replace all the lights on my combine & hay equipment makes it safer to run at night cause you can see further around the equipment
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This item turned out to be very great. Though I’m a little knowledgeable in wiring, I didn’t have to purchase a wiring harness kit for it. I’m typing out a review because it’s a rainy day — and in mentioning that, the in-line fuse on the unit blew out on me just after a few seconds of leaving it on. Just an FYI, to help you out: the flood lamps draw 2.55amps. A 3amp fuse will do the trick, but not on that damp rainy day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Tossed these suckers on my 97 lakota 300 for some added brightness.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Winters

customer_reviews.title: Buy some
customer_reviews.text: You will not be at the slots for the price I put them on my tractor and my lawnmower They’re good for anything. Low current draw to boot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat the price.
customer_reviews.text: Everything came in one box not bad but cant complain about the price about the brightness would buy again and fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Alan and ash

customer_reviews.title: The brightness
customer_reviews.text: Good and bright I bought 4 for our hay truck. I really only needed to use 2 because they were so Bright on the back. So when I'm feeding at night backing up is so much better with the bright visibility.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Albritton

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for a piece of farm equipment so we could work at night. These lights are amazing! Definitely a great buy and will be purchasing more for the rest of our equipment and toys.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley N.

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Looks to be a quality item. Packing could be better, not that there was any damage, but potential for damages is vulnerable. I hardware is very easy to install. I would give a 5 star but I haven't wired them yet I've only had them for 4 days, and haven't completed the project yet, so don't know the output of light as of yet, but I'm optimistic.
customer_reviews.author: BigE1

customer_reviews.title: They are good only for about a year then you’ll have to replaced them
customer_reviews.text: They’re only good for about a year then some of the bulbs start going off. I ordered the 4 pack, used two and kept the other two, well I have replaced both of them already and waiting when they’ll go bad.
customer_reviews.author: alex b.

customer_reviews.title: They work real good so far
customer_reviews.text: Put all four on both sides of my work van. They work real good so far, very satisfied with the light output. The wire coming out of the light is a good useable length, don't know what it is supposed to be but mine were 12 inches long. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice lights, great price.
customer_reviews.text: The lights have been installed on my tractor and they look great. The mounting brackets have raised nubs to hold the bolt while the nut is screwed on the other side. I was mounting one that needed to be screwed in from the bracket side so I just had to flatten the nubs out with a hammer. Not a big deal. They are plenty bright. Hopefully they hold up over time, but for the price they don’t need to last forever to be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap leds
customer_reviews.text: Good inexpensive lights. When leds are this cheap I honestly don't see why people still install halogens in their vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: logan

customer_reviews.title: They are a great fog light.
customer_reviews.text: I put them on my 2009 Fleetwood Revolution. They are really bright and I had no problem making them fit.

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: 1 light the wire was pulled out of the back. Had 2 others on my truck for 8 months before it filled with water and stop working, don't waste your money.

customer_reviews.title: better than expected and received ahead of schedule
customer_reviews.text: better than expected and received ahead of schedule. The lights appear to be well built and are much brighter than the prior lights. Good stainless hardware and easy to install. Would recommend to a freind.

customer_reviews.title: *** WARNING ***  Does NOT have operating voltage range of 10v - 60v as advertised ***
customer_reviews.text: WARNING*** Does NOT have operating voltage range of 10v - 60v as advertised *** Circuit boards fried immediately when connected to only 48v and left permanent smoke damage seen between clear front lens and light reflectors. Fried 1st and 2nd of the 4 lamps when CONNECTED SEPARATELY to 48v. Verifying that these DO NOT operate up to 60v as advertised. However, the 2 remaining lamps do seem to operate ok when connected to only 12v.

They are bright, well built and have a superior waterproof rating which is important to us. Will update if anything changes.

customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed. I ordered these to use as reverse lights on my snow plowing trucks. They are listed as flood lights. Turns out they are spot lights. All that time I wasted wiring and mounting them on 2 trucks. Now I have to get new ones. Thanks Guys, I sure do appreciate it.

customer_reviews.title: These light r nice and bright when they were working

customer_reviews.title: Good until they weren’t
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 of these for my fifth wheel camper as backup lights. Have 2 underneath front pointed toward ditches and 2 on rear bumper pointed backwards. 2 under camper work great, 2 on back are full of water and won’t work at all now. Seems funny that the 2 that are in the weather are full of water after a year and others aren’t. Not weather resistant at all. Only use camper a few times a year and rest of the time it just sits in the yard. Would not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a very good track record
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set of four and installed two of them as daylight running lights. Within 6 months one of them failed, so I replaced it. Now, 6-8 months later another one fails, so I'm down to my last one. Not a very good track record? As a positive . As long as they work, they are very bright and impressive. Well built and easy to install. Just need to make them LAST!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these lights

product_meta.title: LED Light Bar LEDKINGDOMUS 4 Pack 27W 4 inches LED Light Pod Flood Round Work Light Off Road Light LED Fog Light Truck Light Driving Light Boat Light Compatible for Jeep, Truck, Pickup, SUV, ATV, UTV
feature_bullets: Brighter Your Night: 4 inch 27w round LED light bar is equipped with 9, three watt high intensity LEDs. That’s a total of 18W with a 6,000k color temperature. This light bar will extend your field of vision, giving you a better driving experience.

High Performance: Withstands harsh environments thanks to the die-cast aluminum housing which provides strength and durability. An upgraded PC lens surface with high light transmission. Our 4 inch round led pods have a 50,000 hour life span and are IP67 rated waterproof, dust-proof, quake-proof, anti-corrosion for harsh environment.

Excellent Heat Dissipation: In order to get the best heat dissipation, our LED light pod uses 1070 aluminum alloy as the casing which can has best heat dissipation and best seal ability for the heat sink. The sharp aluminum fan design, makes it dissipate heat faster and more effectively. It extends the lifespan of the light bar beyond 50,000 hours.

Adjustable Mounting Accessories:With the included adjustable mounting accessories, the LED work light can adjust to about 90 degrees. This makes changing the direction of the light beam easier. The lamp can slide after the installation.

Extended Utility: This LED flood light bar is compatible with almost all Jeeps, 4x4, trucks, tractors, trailers, golf carts, pickups, cars, motorcycles, SUVs, ATVs & boats. Additionally, there are many indoor and outdoor uses: garden lighting, backyard lighting, backup light, off road lighting, reverse lights, construction lighting and more.

specifications.Special Features: Waterproof, 4Pack 4 inch 27w round led light bar
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars268 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
